channel.title: How To Make Amulets..Like Amulet of Strength and so on
channel.description: How do u make those types of amulets, i kno u can buy them but i wanna craft them and i kno u got to be member to enchant them to. Im in the crafting guild but i still dont know. Thank you for your help.

item.title: How To Make Amulets..Like Amulet of Strength and so on
item.dc:creator: @M0rtion M0rtion
item.description:
@M0rtion wrote:

=] yay he is learning. Yes pritty simple. now lets go through it step by step?

  1. go to al ka rid and mine 1 gold ore.
  2. go accross from al ka rid into the genral store.
    3)buy som clipers [cost 1gp](shit cant afford)
  3. go into the sheep padock use sheres with sheep
  4. either go back minning or go buy a ruby,saphire,dimon, emrald
  5. go to remington and buy a ammy mould
  6. go into fally and use gold ore with furnace
  7. use gold par with furnace then select ruby bit
  8. go south to the southern wall of fally and spin the wool to a ball
  9. use ball of wool on ammy bit
  10. get a cosmic and a specific elemently rune and enchant it

Read full topic
item.source: How To Make Amulets..Like Amulet of Strength and so on

item.title: How To Make Amulets..Like Amulet of Strength and so on
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Make a ruby amulet and enchant them.

Use a gold bar onto a furnace with an amulet mold in your inventory then use a ball of wool on it.

Read full topic
